body_html: @hongjic for async parameter server architecture this is already possible. IE, training begins as soon as all parameter server shards are up, and at at least one worker is up. As more worker come online, the training throughput increases.
body_text: @hongjic for async parameter server architecture this is already possible. IE, training begins as soon as all parameter server shards are up, and at at least one worker is up. As more worker come online, the training throughput increases.
body: @hongjic for async parameter server architecture this is already possible. IE, training begins as soon as all parameter server shards are up, and at at least one worker is up. As more worker come online, the training throughput increases.
